languages.text: "Даже не знаю, Вольный Торговец. У меня может дернуться палец, и Глейто решит, что это приказ выпустить кишки".

traits.locale_text: "А впрочем... я же не какой-нибудь злодей. Проходи, раз уж пришла. Давай-давай, не стесняйся". {n}Скоморох манит вас пальцем.{/n}

languages.text: "I don't know, Rogue Trader. My finger might twitch, and Glaito will think it's an order to spill his guts."
languages.original_text: "Даже не знаю, Вольный Торговец. У меня может дернуться палец, и Глейто решит, что это приказ выпустить кишки".

traits.locale_text: "I do not know, Rogue Trader. My finger might twitch, and Glaito will assume it is an order to spill their guts."
"I do not know, Rogue Trader. My finger might twitch, and Glaito will assume it is an order to spill their guts."
"I don't know, Rogue Trader. My finger might twitch, and Glaito will think it's an order to spill their guts."

"I don't know, Rogue Trader. My finger might twitch, and Glaito will think it's an order to spill his guts."
"I don't know, Rogue Trader. My finger might twitch, and Glaito will think it's an order to spill his guts."

languages.text: “我说不太好，行商浪人。我的手指可能会不小心抽动一下，而格雷托可能会误以为我打算把他的内脏全掏出来。”
languages.original_text: "I don't know, Rogue Trader. My finger might twitch, and Glaito will think it's an order to spill his guts."

traits.locale_text: “我说不太好，行商浪人。我的手指可能会不小心抽动一下，而格雷托可能会误以为我打算把他的内脏全掏出来。”

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダー、それはどうでしょう。私の指がピクッと動いただけで、グライトが『内臓を引きずり出せ』って命令だと受け取るかもしれませんよ」
languages.original_text: "I don't know, Rogue Trader. My finger might twitch, and Glaito will think it's an order to spill his guts."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダー、それはどうでしょう。私の指がピクッと動いただけで、グライトが『内臓を引きずり出せ』って命令だと受け取るかもしれませんよ」

languages.text: «No sé yo, Comerciante Independiente. A lo peor se me crispa el dedo y Glaito lo interpreta como una orden para destriparlo a mordiscos».
languages.original_text: "I don't know, Rogue Trader. My finger might twitch, and Glaito will think it's an order to spill his guts."

traits.locale_text: «No sé yo, Comerciante Independiente. A lo peor se me crispa el dedo y Glaito lo interpreta como una orden para destriparlo a mordiscos».

languages.text: "Bilemiyorum Hür Tacir. Parmağım seyirebilir, Glaito da bunu bağırsaklarını dökmesini emrediyorum olarak algılayabilir."
languages.original_text: "I don't know, Rogue Trader. My finger might twitch, and Glaito will think it's an order to spill his guts."

traits.locale_text: "Bilemiyorum Hür Tacir. Parmağım seyirebilir, Glaito da bunu bağırsaklarını dökmesini emrediyorum olarak algılayabilir."

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas, {rt_mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mon doigt risque de tressaillir et Glaito prendrait ça pour l'ordre de l'éventrer. »
languages.original_text: "I don't know, Rogue Trader. My finger might twitch, and Glaito will think it's an order to spill his guts."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne sais pas, {rt_mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mon doigt risque de tressaillir et Glaito prendrait ça pour l'ordre de l'éventrer. »

languages.text: "Ich weiß nicht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Mein Finger könnte zucken, dann denkt Glaito, er soll ihn zerfleischen."
languages.original_text: "I don't know, Rogue Trader. My finger might twitch, and Glaito will think it's an order to spill his guts."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß nicht, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Mein Finger könnte zucken, dann denkt Glaito, er soll ihn zerfleischen."
